message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $130. I believe it offers significant value at this price, considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay that amount for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $120. Would you consider meeting me halfway at $125?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $125. How about we meet at $115? I'm willing to make a serious offer at that price.
